Detailed Description

Represents a single location, which may be a single point or a range.

Member Function Documentation

void Location::compare ( DOMString  otherLoc)

Compare this location with another one.

TDOD Implement with Promises

where result will be
-1 if the supplied value is before this one
0 if the supplied value is the same as this one
1 if the supplied value is after this one

precise will be true if the CFI match is precise, else false

Parameters
otherLocthe other location to be compared to this one
callbackthe function to be called with results
DOMString Location::getLocation ( )

Returns the location in the document, expressed as a CFI

Returns
the CFI string representing the location
boolean Location::getLocationPrecision ( )

Returns whether the current location is precisely known

Returns
true if precisely known, else false
